pages.text:
About Us
Want to know about us? Well, first of all, welcome to the Clear Sky Draught Haus. When you come and see us you will certainly understand why we are not your average, everyday draft house.
The Dunedin gastro pub, modeled after a popular dining trend in many metropolitan cities like San Francisco, Toronto, New York, and Chicago, will be food-focused, with a fresh chef-driven, pub grub menu. The menu includes artisan flatbread, sandwiches, gourmet pizzas, unique burgers, short ribs, and plenty of vegetarian options. Of course, as the name implies, the menu is complemented by high-end craft beers and ciders.
Restaurant Hours:
Mon – Thu: 8 AM – 11 PM
Friday: 8 AM – 12 AM
Saturday: 8 AM – 12 AM
Sunday: 8 AM – 10 PM
Breakfast Served
Mon – Fri: 8 AM – 11:30 AM
Sat-Sun: 8 AM – 12 PM
Bloody Mary Bar
Sat – Sun: 8AM – 2PM
Map and Directions
Restaurant Location:
680 Main St
Dunedin FL 34698
Phone:
(727) 286-6266
Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner  EVERYDAY
Call today to be added to our call-ahead seating list!
While this does not guarantee your space will be available immediately it does provide you with the next available table and ensures that we are able to plan accordingly to provide the best experience to all guests
CALL
(727) 286-6266
TODAY! or use Open Table
Clear Sky Draught Haus offers 37 craft beers on tap, another 30+ varieties of bottled beer, plus wine and full bar. We serve breakfast, lunch/dinner and have a late night menu. Located 680 Main St., our Restaurant in Dunedin, Florida is fronting downtown’s easternmost gateway, located where Main Street meets State Road 580
Map & Directions
Community Involvement
We love to make a difference in our community.
Clearwater Beach Chamber of Commerce | Clearwater Regional Chamber of Commerce | Clearwater Marine Aquarium | Friends of Art – Artistic Tastings-Donation to Clearwater Regional Chamber of Commerce & Clearwater Arts Foundation | Martini & Matese-Art Foundation Restaurant Week-Donation to Clearwater Aquarium | RCS Food Bank-Ongoing community service | National Information Officers Association Community Schools-Clearwater, Palm Harbor-Continued donations for specified events | St Celia School | UParc | Big Brothers/Sisters  | Clearwater Library | Loving Pet Care | Morning Star School
